summary: Build a website (interactive Valentine’s Day greeting card) based on provided HTML/CSS/JS, including updated Screen 1 layout (centered envelope, "Hey Love" text above heart CTA, "14.02.2026" date below) and removal of the hand-nudge hint across all screens.
known_issues: Screen 1: Envelope is positioned toward the left instead of centered on the screen.
Screen 1: "Hey Love" and "14.02.2026" text is appearing behind/under the heart emoji (z-index/layering issue).

existing_features.title: Build a complete single-page website that recreates the provided Valentine’s Day interactive greeting card experience: an envelope that opens on user interaction, revealing a card, then displaying a Valentine message with smooth animations and delightful micro-interactions.

Create a coherent visual theme for the website (color palette, typography, spacing, and animation style) and apply it consistently across the page using Tailwind CSS. Avoid blue/purple as the primary palette.
Add basic site structure and metadata: a page title, a short description for sharing/SEO, and a simple footer credit line. All user-facing text must be in English.

Include generated static image assets for the Valentine’s theme (placed under frontend/public/assets/generated) and render them in the UI (e.g., background decoration, envelope texture, or heart accents) without routing images through the backend.
Update the action button on the message screen to display the label "Again" instead of "Replay".
Change the behavior of the "Again" button on the message screen so that clicking it navigates back to screen 1 (the initial envelope screen).
Update Screen 1 (envelope scene) copy so the date text exactly matches "14.02.2026" (not an abbreviated form), while keeping "Hey Love" above the Heart CTA.

Remove the hand-nudge hint/animation from all screens (including any pointing-hand emoji and associated animation classes) so no hand-nudge appears in Screen 1, Screen 2 (card), or Screen 3 (message).

On Screen 1 (envelope scene), ensure the selected envelope content block is visually centered on the screen (not shifted toward the left). Apply this change ONLY to the selected element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[4]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[3].

Fix the layering/overlap on Screen 1 so that the "Hey Love" and "14.02.2026" text is not rendered behind/under the heart emoji (heart seal). Apply this change ONLY to the selected element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[4]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[3].
